resources: Copy Master Copy Master is active! Never miss a copied content anymore! No clips found Turn on Copy Master to get copied clips here Copy Master Keep this switch active Total Offensive Links Unsafe Links Delete All It\'s so lonely here. You turn the above switch ON and start copying content. Do you really want to delete all? Yes No Type your search query Copy Master Important Clips About The main intention of this app is to make sure that you don\'t miss any data copied to the clipboard as the clipboard data is constantly overwritten by new copied content. Additionally, when you want to take important notes or copy an important url online, all you have to do is just copy the content; this app automatically saves and organizes them for you, reducing your effort on manual copy-paste headache. Developed by Logo by Language & Libraries Mohamed Irfan Kotlin, Realm DB, Livedata, Foreground Service Mustaq Sameer Click here for license details License Information Mustaq Sameer Applications | 2020 irfanofficialzx@gmail.com devmustaq@gmail.com Feedback q Text Copied Share the copied clip Press again to exit Copy Master is Active Copy Master is Stopped Turn this switch ON to save the copied data into this app
